trans-unit.source: Represents a hierarchical data source that hierarchical data-bound controls such as <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" /> can bind to.
trans-unit.target: 表示階層式資料繫結控制項 (例如 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" />) 可以繫結至的階層式資料來源。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET supports a control data-binding architecture that enables Web server controls to bind to data and present it in a consistent fashion.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 支援控制項的資料繫結架構，可讓 Web 伺服器控制項繫結至資料，並加以呈現一致的方式。

trans-unit.source: Web server controls that bind to data are called data-bound controls, and the classes that facilitate binding are called data source controls.
trans-unit.target: 繫結至資料的 web 伺服器控制項的稱為資料繫結控制項，並協助繫結的類別稱為資料來源控制項。

trans-unit.source: Data source controls can represent any data source: a file, a stream, a relational database, a business object, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 資料來源控制項可以表示任何資料來源： 檔案、 資料流、 關聯式資料庫、 商務物件等等。

trans-unit.source: Data source controls present data in a consistent way to data-bound controls, regardless of the source or format of the underlying data.
trans-unit.target: 資料繫結控制項，不論來源或基礎資料的格式一致的方式中的資料來源控制項呈現資料。

trans-unit.source: Data source controls that represent hierarchical data derive from the <xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceControl> class, which is the base ASP.NET implementation of the <xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalDataSource> interface.
trans-unit.target: 代表階層式資料的資料來源控制項衍生自<xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceControl>類別，這是基底 ASP.NET 實作的<xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalDataSource>介面。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalDataSource> interface is used to define data source controls that expose hierarchical data, rather than tabular or list-style data, to Web server controls that derive from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> class, such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalDataSource>介面是用來定義階層式資料，公開 （expose） 的資料來源控制項，而不是表格式或清單樣式的資料，以 Web 伺服器控制項衍生自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl>類別，例如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The interface defines a single method, <xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalDataSource.GetHierarchicalView%2A>, which retrieves a strongly typed <xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceView> object.
trans-unit.target: 介面會定義單一方法<xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalDataSource.GetHierarchicalView%2A>，抓取強型別<xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceView>物件。

trans-unit.source: Data source controls that implement this interface support a hierarchical view for each hierarchical level of data they represent.
trans-unit.target: 實作這個介面的資料來源控制項支援的資料代表每個階層層級的階層式檢視。

trans-unit.source: The data source views are not named, like <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView> objects, but are identified by their unique hierarchical path, which is the `viewPath` parameter passed to the <xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalDataSource.GetHierarchicalView%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 資料來源檢視未命名，例如<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView>的物件，但由其唯一的階層式路徑，也就是識別`viewPath`參數傳遞至<xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalDataSource.GetHierarchicalView%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: You can think of a data source control as the combination of the <xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalDataSource> object and its associated views on the underlying data.
trans-unit.target: 您可以將資料來源控制項的組合視為<xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalDataSource>物件和其相關聯的檢視基礎資料。

trans-unit.source: Each associated <xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceView> object defines the capabilities of a data source control for the hierarchical level represented, and, like all ASP.NET data source view objects, performs operations such as insert, update, delete, and sort.
trans-unit.target: 每個相關聯<xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceView>物件會定義資料來源控制項表示，階層的層級的功能，並如所有 ASP.NET 資料來源檢視物件，執行作業，例如 insert、 update、 delete 和排序。

trans-unit.source: Data source controls that expose only hierarchical data, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource>, are derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceControl> class.
trans-unit.target: 資料來源控制項來公開階層式資料，例如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource>，衍生自<xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceControl>類別。

trans-unit.source: Other data source controls that expose their data as both hierarchical data and tabular data, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource>, are derived from <xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceControl> but implement the <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSource> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource> interfaces.
trans-unit.target: 其他資料來源控制項，將其資料公開為階層式資料和表格式資料，例如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource>，衍生自<xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceControl>但實作<xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSource>和<xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource>介面。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to extend the abstract <xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceControl> class, which implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalDataSource> interface, to create a data source control that displays file system information.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何擴充抽象<xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceControl>類別，它會實作<xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalDataSource>介面，以建立顯示檔案系統資訊的資料來源控制項。

trans-unit.source: The `FileSystemDataSource` class provides an implementation of the <xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalDataSource.GetHierarchicalView%2A> method, which retrieves a strongly typed view object for a specified file system path.
trans-unit.target: `FileSystemDataSource`類別提供的實作<xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalDataSource.GetHierarchicalView%2A>方法，擷取指定的檔案系統路徑的強型別的檢視物件。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceControl> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceControl>類別。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the data storage that the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalDataSource" /> interface represents has changed.
trans-unit.target: 當 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalDataSource" /> 介面所表示的資料儲存體已變更時發生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalDataSource.DataSourceChanged> event is raised when a change is made to the data source control's properties, such as changing the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource.DataFile%2A> property of an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource> control, or changing the data in the underlying data storage, which happens when XML nodes are changed by an edit action performed by an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalDataSource.DataSourceChanged>變更資料來源控制項的屬性，例如變更時，就會引發事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource.DataFile%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource>控制項，或變更基礎資料存放區，這種 XML 節點變更時的資料所執行的編輯動作<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The hierarchical path of the view to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: 要擷取之檢視的階層式路徑。

trans-unit.source: Gets the view helper object for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalDataSource" /> interface for the specified path.
trans-unit.target: 為指定之路徑的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalDataSource" /> 介面，取得檢視 Helper 物件。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceView" /> that represents a single view of the data at the hierarchical level identified by the <paramref name="viewPath" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceView" />，表示階層式資料的單一檢視，由 <paramref name="viewPath" /> 參數識別此資料的階層式層次。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalDataSource> interface, like the <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSource> interface, defines a method that hierarchical data source controls use to retrieve a data source view.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalDataSource>介面，例如<xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSource>介面，用來定義階層式資料來源控制項用來擷取資料來源檢視的方法。

trans-unit.source: Like all <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView> helper objects that are associated with data source controls, a <xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceView> object defines the operations that the data source can perform with the underlying data.
trans-unit.target: 如同所有<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView>協助程式物件與資料來源控制項，相關聯的<xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceView>物件定義資料來源可以使用基礎資料執行的作業。

trans-unit.source: However, although data source controls that represent tabular data typically have only one named view, hierarchical data source controls support a view for each level of hierarchical data that the data source control represents.
trans-unit.target: 不過，雖然通常代表表格式資料的資料來源控制項有只有一個具名的檢視，階層式資料來源控制項支援檢視資料來源控制項所代表的階層式資料的每個層級。

trans-unit.source: The level of hierarchical data is identified by a unique hierarchical path, passed as the `viewPath` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 階層式資料的層級由唯一的階層式路徑，做為傳遞`viewPath`參數。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to override the <xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalDataSource.GetHierarchicalView%2A> method in a class that extends the <xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceControl> class to retrieve a strongly typed <xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceView> object for a unique hierarchical path.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalDataSource.GetHierarchicalView%2A>方法擴充的類別中<xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceControl>類別來擷取的強型別<xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceView>唯一的階層式路徑的物件。

trans-unit.source: The `FileSystemDataSource` class's implementation of <xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalDataSource.GetHierarchicalView%2A> retrieves a `FileSystemDataSourceView` object for a specified file system path.
trans-unit.target: `FileSystemDataSource`類別的實作<xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalDataSource.GetHierarchicalView%2A>擷取`FileSystemDataSourceView`物件指定的檔案系統路徑。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceControl> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceControl>類別。
